name: Magic Bubbles
description:
Match 5 or more bubbles of different colors and types by relocating them on an 81 squares board. Game mechanics change as you advance to next levels so the tactics you've learned in the past must be adapted for the future.

Features:

  • Suitable for all ages
  • 7 different game mechanics
  • Relaxing sounds and dynamic graphics
  • Intuitive interface
  • Save or load game progress
  • Unlimited moves to undo or redo
  • No time limit
  • Internet connection is recommended for things like leaderboard or achievements but not mandatory.
